attributes.action: Do you agree britain lost its identity
attributes.additional_details: Britain has lost its way in itself and the world...its culture has been eroded by the dilution of too many cultures in too shorter time..We do not know who we are and our place in the world. Our traditional values are not compatible with significant new comers to the point that settled communities have been destroyed within one generation. We need to rebuild confidence back into Britian by supporting ourselves..and if that means upsetting Europe.ie put on hold eu directives and put on hold any institutions that support those directives.We are only going to be poorer if we dont.
